website_summaries.verdict: Kids will love having a nap mat that features the popular Paw Patrol characters. Perfectly sized for toddlers.
pros: Mat rolls up tightly with Velcro closure tabs and a carrying handle so you can transport it anywhere
Very comfortable product, as the mat is quilted and includes a fleece blanket and a pillow
Easy to clean in a washing machine
Available in five popular cartoon characters
cons: At 46 inches long, a little smaller than some other nap mat options

customer_reviews.title: this is as good as the other character
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo is OBSESSED with paw patrol. She uses this for naptime at preschool. They put their mats on top of a sleep cot. This is standard size and fits her perfectly. If your child likes PP, this is as good as the other character. It's pretty well made, except that we have to wash it every week and the stuffing inside the pillow is a little loose and the paper name card is all ripped up from washing.
customer_reviews.author: KndT

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. We needed a pillow and blanket for ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. We needed a pillow and blanket for our 16hr plane ride, and my LO loves paw patrol so this looked like a great fit. He slept very comfortably next to me on our flight. The pillow was soft enough on it's own but I had to cushion the arm rest with another pillow which was perfectly fine. The only thing I didn't like is it's hard to fold back up and it folds back larger than it originally was. Which could just be me but still. This is a great product. 9
customer_reviews.author: Juveria Mahvish

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Paw Patrol and was in need of an alternate nap mat for daycare (she has a Yo Gabba Gabba one too). She LOVES this mat and it's very soft. She likes to carry it herself too so it's nice that it rolls up with velcro to hold it. My only complaint is there's no option to remove the pillow when washing like I can with her Yo Gabba Gabba mat, so the pillow can get a little clumpy after washing/drying but that's about it. Refluff the pillow, roll it up, and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice for naps, soft
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and soft, easy to wash and dry, my child loves it. Helpful tip: Always before washing, close the velcro attachments together or they will stick on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to take with him to daycare for nap time and it serves its purpose. I agree with other reviewers that the pillow does get bunched up after washing, but it doesn’t seem to bother my son. I would suggest removing the paper info tag prior to washing because that does get tattered and torn pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my great nephew and he loves it😃
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: My almost 4 year old was so excited for school with his nap pad
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler was so excited for his first day of preschool with his nap pad. He is not quite four, and has learned to roll it up on his own. We have frequent washing and no complaints thus far on durability. I like the blanket and pillow are attached and not available to lose or get separated from the pad. Convenient to carry, and wash. Fits in the washer fine, dries fine. Not too big and bulky for frequent washing.
customer_reviews.author: Jdenise

customer_reviews.title: Hum bug to roll back up.
customer_reviews.text: Son uses this for school and works great. The only issue I have is rolling it back up to get the Velcro to stick. Both sides need to fold to the center then it can be rolled and velcroed. The other one I have, you just need to fold in half then roll.
customer_reviews.author: JMow

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat!
customer_reviews.text: My little one LOVES this. The pillow isn't very full, but it's better than sleeping on a flat nap mat. The blanket is very soft and he actually asks to take a nap with it now. Hopefully he'll be as easy going at school. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it. Not very cushioned though, ...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it. Not very cushioned though, so it can be a little hard on a tile floor. Luckily my son doesn't really nap, but he does have to lay down in class when his friends take naps.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it...so does his mom!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is nice and comfortable. A quick spritz with some kid-safe cleaner and it's ready to use again,throw it in the washer when it needs it My grandson loves it and that's what matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: 100%  Granny

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat to use with cot or over padded mat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his cot at daycare and he LOVES it. The pillow needs to be "fluffed" back into place a little after a wash, but other than that it's great. Keeps my little guy warm. This is best for something over a mat or a cot. It is not padded enough for being on a hard ground on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love that the pillow does not need to be removed ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that the pillow does not need to be removed for washing. It has held up very well thus far.
customer_reviews.author: ODAM

customer_reviews.title: So far it is still in great shape, just typical wash wear
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves this nap mat...he uses it at school and we wash it weekly. So far it is still in great shape, just typical wash wear. I need to fluff the pillow after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Jrock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for a fitted sheet and a blanket
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Perfect replacement for a fitted sheet and a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Same exact as shows in the picture. He is excited about pillow, blanket in one.
customer_reviews.author: Taru

customer_reviews.title: This was great for school and held up very well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES spidey! This was great for school and held up very well! I was even able to successfully put it through the washer a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cozy, perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son has used this nap mat for PreK-2 and half of PreK-3 and it’s still in good condition. It’s held up well, especially with my rambunctious toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wheat

customer_reviews.title: For my grandson
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. Took it to daycare and that is what he uses for naps.
customer_reviews.author: woodrose

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable as per the child.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right away. Product as described and most importantly child loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Be sure to check the length.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice affordable alternative to the crazy expensive nap mats. The blanket is attached to the mat, which my son likes so he can wrap up nice and snug. You might want to check the length on this mat, some children will be much longer than the mat will allow. There is just enough padding to make the mat comfortable, the blanket is a really soft fleece. The pillow isn't super stuffed (could be stuffed tighter in my opinion) but it rolls up nicely and fits inside my son's paw patrol backpack. It isn't enormous, it's just good enough for your child for a nap at school a few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Cinstress

customer_reviews.title: was a Christmas gift for a 3 yr old boy ...
customer_reviews.text: was a Christmas gift for a 3 yr old boy, he loves it! Christmas deliveries were a mess this year. This one arrived 3 days after Christmas, just as my nephew was getting in the car. Literally the boy and the mailman met in the driveway
customer_reviews.author: Vasile Nistor

customer_reviews.title: My only issue is it sheds like crazy. After the 2nd or 3rd wash it ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. My only issue is it sheds like crazy. After the 2nd or 3rd wash it gets better but then the stuffing in the pillow gets all bunched up. These issues are not specific to this nap mat. Seems to be a problem with all in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Carter

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson, age 2 1/2 just loves the soft cover and very much into paw patrol! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S

customer_reviews.title: Super great buy for daycare/preschool nap time
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Exactly what my daughter needed for preschool. Nap mat plus pillow plus cover/blanket all in one sweet roll-able device. I'd buy a dozen more, but we don't need them.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves Paw Patrol. My kid loves this blanket for nap time at preschool. They have cots at preschool that the teacher puts this on top of. It isn't a super fluffy mat, blanket, or pillow, but it serves it's purpose pretty well for nap time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Kids use them at school everyday to take naps. Wash well and wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Cabonor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great to bring to daycare. Easy to fold up and store away. My child loves this!
customer_reviews.author: angl2b

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, super cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my preschooler. He loves it! I have washed about 100 times and still intact!
customer_reviews.author: yali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES this! I bought it for him for daycare, but is more suited for home use!
customer_reviews.author: Marie King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this at daycare. It is holding up to weekly washes and toddler abuse at daycare! :)
customer_reviews.author: Yonah Eveline

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo daughter loves Paw Patrol and this mat. Great for travelling, preschool and grandma's house. It's not meant to be used as sleeping bag just a light blanket and pillow. Very easy to transport and even comes with a little handle.
customer_reviews.author: A H

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is pretty wimpy. I wished it was a little longer
customer_reviews.text: Really soft. The pillow is pretty wimpy. I wished it was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it for daycare nap times
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is you can’t roll it tight because of how the Velcro is attached it could get way smaller otherwise
customer_reviews.author: One happy momma

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Nap Mat is awesome! My grandson loves it! Really good quality, great color and big enough to last several years. Don't hesitate to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: MamaJo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My very big 3 year old love napping with this everday at daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Ec

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit short for my 4 year old and thinner than I expected. But he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: startb

customer_reviews.title: Get your sewing suplies ready.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t pleased when I received this. I had to sew in so many places.
customer_reviews.author: Lilvampire+darkangel

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers' favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Nap time is more fun now at daycare. It will only cover your toddler if he doesn't move (doubt it..)
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia Liriano

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed! The blanket is soft and the pillow is small enough that allows the mat to be rolled perfectly. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Has held up as well as the $50 name brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Has held up as well as the $50 name brand nap mat I bought my daughter. Very soft and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Helfer

customer_reviews.title: Pawfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product! It is Exactly as described. Very convient as it has it's own pillow and cover. I only wish it was a little thicker or provided more padding
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: I have washed them multiple times and they have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my four year old. I have washed them multiple times and they have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. It is perfect for my son to bring to preschool. It is very soft, rolls up and travels very easily and I love that it is in one piece so nothing gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Useless for a Daycare Nap Mat
customer_reviews.text: The bag that was shipped to us was an "inflateable" napmat and required inflating. Useless for a Daycare Nap Mat.
customer_reviews.author: RKB

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES this mat!!! He looks forward to going to school so he can lay on his mat at nap time lol. It’s not very big but is big enough
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It was a big hit he loved it as well as his parents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Nephews 2nd Bday. It was a big hit he loved it as well as his parents. They put it in his crib and sleeps in it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Carol3

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for his naps. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pillow doesn’t come out to wash. I’m interested to see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it. I wish the mat part was thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: No Padding
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed In this product. I was expecting there to be some kind of padding since it’s a sleeping mat. And there is absolutely no padding at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Symonds

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean fold and carry
customer_reviews.text: My PreK baby loves it. Easy to clean fold and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super cute easy to clean and soft
customer_reviews.text: This went through many many washes and still looks great. The blanket is really soft too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This has a super soft blanket and it's perfect for a light rest
customer_reviews.text: This has a super soft blanket and it's perfect for a light rest. Not heavy duty and I wouldn't recommend for everyday use like taking to a daycare center but for playtime or for your house it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The top cover is very soft and feels like mink.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new nap time blanket. The top cover is very soft and feels like mink.
customer_reviews.author: shae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My great-grandson was thrilled with his sleeping map for Pre-K3
customer_reviews.author: Edna A. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Paw Patrol mat for my nephew and when I saw tat smile I knew it was the right decision. Love, love, love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: wanda shepard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She uses it at school daily!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nap, I don't need no stinking nap!
customer_reviews.text: It was made well. I just wish it was a little longer as my grandson is quite tall.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON SUNDERLAND

customer_reviews.title: ... son loves this paw patrol mat and It works great for nap time at preschool
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this paw patrol mat and It works great for nap time at preschool.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves.... this mat. ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves.... this mat. He takes everywhere he goes. It is warm and big enough for two small toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: trincess

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it IMO.
customer_reviews.text: For the popularity of Paw Patrol these days, the cost of the mat and the type of material. It was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Already has a hole and we have only had it one week and used 3 times :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather Frye

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. I will be using a nap mat ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I will be using a nap mat before I let my toddler use it in the floor. Pillow doesn't have support.
customer_reviews.author: Bibay08

customer_reviews.title: I have washed it & it's held up nice so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Paw Patrol nap mat for my toddler. He uses it for daycare & at home he loves it. My only issue is I can't take the pillow cushion out. I have washed it & it's held up nice so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's not thick. The quality is not that good. I did not like it
customer_reviews.author: HV

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ver thin but the material is soft. My son likes it
customer_reviews.author: MRA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not thick enough for my toddler. We thought it would be a little thicker
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and durable. My 3 yo son loves it. It's better than the expensive mats that are sold at the uniform and back to school stores. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Great nap mat. Just wish my son would take nap! Easy to wash and easy for him to carry into school himself.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyfan223

customer_reviews.title: washing it once a week.... the ...
customer_reviews.text: washing it once a week .... the "pillow" will not last. $30 was too much to spend on this product.
customer_reviews.author: R.Carrsco

customer_reviews.title: can't wait to take a nap.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves his napping blanket and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: My kid can carry his own stuff. It makes ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid can carry his own stuff. It makes it easier to pick out what he wants to take to school.
customer_reviews.author: Iesha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat for day care
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Great nap mat for day care!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: very happy thank u
customer_reviews.text: Love it couldnt get it in Australia for the same money and was including post very happy
customer_reviews.author: celise smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rest mat for my 5 year old to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rest mat for my 5 year old to take to school! He loves it! It has a handle built in so he can carry it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Would not spend the money again
customer_reviews.text: After just one week of use the blanket is pulling appart. It’s just coming unwoven from normal use. I’ve been trying to spot sew the tears because of the money I spent on it but will not purchase again. It’s unfortunate because my Toddler loves paw patrol so much I can’t seem to get rid of it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chinchilla

customer_reviews.title: Fun Item but not Large
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old granddaughter uses this as her daycare sleep mat. She loves the graphics and it is good that the blanket is attached to the bottom along one side. It is not very long, though. I expect that she will outgrow it by age 3.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: perfect for naps and like a small sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This is just wonderful! Perfect size for 2-3 year olds. Very soft and comfortable and easily folds back up into the carrying straps. My grandson loved this for his 3rd birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loves this and uses it for his school nap each day.
customer_reviews.author: Dorita

customer_reviews.title: Great thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great item sheds some lint otherwise washes well without any changes or damages to product dry in medium heat my kid is crazy about his paw patrol items so this was a great buy would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JULIEN BHOKAL

customer_reviews.title: Be Warned: No child included with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that when the mat arrived there was no child inside. The picture clearly shows a small child with the nap mat and nowhere in the description does it say 'child not included". False advertising at the highest possible level. Stupid Paw Patrol got my hopes up and then dashed them against the rocks.....and sharp rocks they are.
customer_reviews.author: FMBoB

customer_reviews.title: Good material and very comfortable for my 2 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Good material and very comfortable for my 2 year old son. It could use a little more stuffing but overall it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Paw Patrol Toddler Nap Mat, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BluePaw Patrol is on a roll toddler nap mat. Take your favorite Paw Patrol friends, Marshall, Chase and Rubble with you for nap time or overnight trips. 100% polyester mat with 100% polyester fleece attached blanket with multi color print. 46" long x 21" wide, the nap mat rolls up with velcro close tabs and convenient carrying handle. A quilted mat, fleece blanket and pillow all in one.
feature_bullets: Quilted Mat, Fleece Blanket and Pillow All in One
Great for Sleep Overs, Daycare, and more.
Rolls Up with velcro closures and carry handle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
